mapper.select: SELECT tn.pk_id, tn.title, tn.cover, tn.label, tn.browse_num, tn.star_num FROM t_news tn JOIN t_index_content tic ON tn.pk_id = tic.content_id WHERE tn.state = 4 AND tic.type = 1 AND tic.category_id = 78 GROUP BY tn.pk_id, tn.title, tn.cover, tn.label, tn.browse_num, tn.star_num ORDER BY tn.create_time DESC LIMIT 18

SELECT tn.pk_id, tn.title, tn.cover, tn.label, tn.browse_num, tn.star_num FROM t_news tn JOIN t_index_content tic ON tn.pk_id = tic.content_id WHERE tn.state = 4 AND tic.type = 1 AND tic.category_id = 78
AND tn.title LIKE concat('%',#{query.title},'%')
ORDER BY tn.create_time DESC
SELECT tn.* FROM t_news tn WHERE tn.pk_id = #{id} AND tn.state = 4
